passage_text: Conditions that Pataday Eye Drops Can Treat. Pataday eye drops are usually used for the treatment of allergic conjunctivitis. In some cases, it is used to treat people who have allergic rhinitis that affects the eye.

passage_text: This medication comes in the form of an eyedrop. It is used in each eye just once a day. It does not matter what time of day you use Pataday, but it is best to take it at the same time each day. If you wear contact lenses, you must remove them to use the drops.

passage_text: Pataday Dosage. The standard recommended Pataday dosage for the treatment of eye allergy symptoms is one drop in each affected eye once a day. This dose is the same for everyone, regardless of your age or the severity of your symptoms.
